Rhythmyx 6 Public API

Package com.percussion.util

Utility classes which are used throughout E2 are defined in this package.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IPSHtmlParameters This interface specifies all HTML parameters used and known by Rhythmyx code, applications and extensions.
 

Class Summary
IOTools The IOTools class contains IO helper utilities.
PSBase64Decoder The PSBase64Decoder class is used to decode data from the base64 format.
PSBase64Encoder The PSBase64Encoder class is used to encode data from the base64 format.
PSCollection The PSCollection class is used to maintain a collection of objects.
PSDateFormatHttp The PSDateFormatHttp formats dates in the HTTP specified format.
PSDateFormatISO8601 The PSDateFormatISO8601 formats dates in ISO 8601 format.
PSExtensionInstallTool This class is used to bootstrap the extension manager and manipulate it without having to load the entire server.
PSItemErrorDoc Utility class to produce the error documents to be created by item level validation exits.
PSLineBreaker This class is used to break a string up into lines with a length not more than a specified width, breaking the line at the first embedded new line or a whitespace or dash that is found closest to the end of the line and is within a given threshold.
PSPurgableTempFile This class is used to create a temporary file which is deleted when it is garbage collected.
PSURLEncoder The PSURLEncoder class is a utility class which supports encoding URLs.
PSUrlUtils A utility class that contains methods useful for processing URLs.
PSWorkflowInfo This class contains the workflow information retrieved from the sys_psxWorkflowCataloger/workflowinfo resource.
PSXMLDomUtil Helper class to facilitate common XML tasks.
 

Package com.percussion.util Description

Utility classes which are used throughout E2 are defined in this package.
